columns.sql: select s1.d, sessionnum, client_code from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s order by d) s1 left join (select session_id, sessionnum, client_code from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id = i.session_id where s.azscode = :azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by session_id, sessionnum, client_code) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode = :azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)

columngroup.sql: select name as groupname, code as groupparam from wares where incl > 0

columns.sql: select volume, price, whole from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s order by d) s1 left join (select i.session_id, sum(volume) as volume, sum(whole) as whole from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id = i.session_id where s.azscode = :azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by session_id, sessionnum, client_code) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id left join (select s.id as session_id, w.price_r as price from sessions s join wareprices w on s.id = w.session_id where w.ware_code=:groupparam and s.azscode = :azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by session_id, price) s3 on s1.session_id = s3.session_id where s1.azscode = :azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)
